description: A look at how Best Buy’s increased focus on e-commerce to compete with Amazon has led to a rebound in sales following a dismal holiday season. Plus, Anup Ghosh, CEO of Invincea,  on the three big hacking stories this week. Also, a conversation with video game voice actress Jennifer Hale about acting out of context and how the industry is changing.
title: Marketplace Tech for Thursday, May 22, 2014
